root.name: Manual Tracking
root.description: Like to do things old-school? Track your objects manually, the Icy way!
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:

* Added instructions on the interface * Simplified and optimised code * Fixed several issues

Many bug fixes and easier to use
